mapper.insert: insert into freeboard_rep(rep_no, member_no, freeboard_no, rep_content, rep_regidate, rep_parent_no) values(freeboard_rep_seq.nextval, 105, #{freeboard_no}, #{rep_content}, to_char(sysdate,'YY.MM.DD HH.MI'), 0)
mapper.update: update freeboard_rep set rep_status = 0 where rep_no = #{rep_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from freeboard_rep where freeboard_no = #{freeboard_no} and rep_status = 1
